document_data.name: Celestial steel
document_data.mainbody: '''''Celestial steel''''' was a type of heavenly [[metal]] that originated from the [[Upper Planes]].
document_data.Applications: The only recorded use of celestial steel was in the creation of the [[sentient item|intelligent]] [[relic]] known as the ''[[Sword of Zariel]]'', the namesake blade of the zealous [[solar]] [[Zariel]].
document_data.Variations: * [[Solanian truesteel]], a variety of gleaming, fine [[iron]] found on [[Solania]], the fourth level of [[Mount Celestia]].
